ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not all of them, only the best ones =) To me, the single target ones aren t proper stuns, more like very short mez, and break easily (sound familiar) ...
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 12 Oct 2000 13:49:38 -0700, jhenders@... wrote:

>On Thu, Oct 12/00, John Tatsukawa <john@...> wrote:
>>
>> I haven't really thought much about stunning a mob before mezzing them.
>> I'll bring this up with my friend and maybe give it a try. Unfortunately,
>> we've moved away from Frogtown in Lake of Ill Omen which was pretty common
>> for multiple pulls. Of course, we don't have AOE stun spells so I can't
>> comment about that, but AOE mez has been extremely nice as long as our
>> group keeps the frogs together.
>>
>
>All enchanter stuns are aoe.

Not all of them, only the best ones =)

To me, the single target ones aren't proper stuns, more like very
short mez, and break easily (sound familiar) ... whirl til you hurl
series and the dizzying draught one .... all see to break stun as soon
as someone hits them. /shrug

All the colour series are AOE however :)

--
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (48)
Expert bard, novice brewer, hardened drinker and terrific flirt!

Kalara, Dark Elf Enchanter (35)
Dying at a venue near you soon
